text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle

Product features:
Made in the United States
100% recycled materials
1000 piece puzzle
Artist Lee Stoncek
Jigsaw puzzle
text.Response A: White Mountain Puzzles is proud to bring you the Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle.  This Made in USA puzzle is made with 100% recycled materials and features 1000 pieces.  The artistic rendering of the nesting loons is the work of renowned artist Lee Stoncek.  White Mountain Puzzles is the oldest puzzle manufacturer in America and has been making puzzles for over 30 years.  They are a family owned business and take great pride in the quality of their products.  This puzzle would make a great gift for any puzzle lover, wildlife enthusiast, or someone who just wants to relax with a fun activity.  Order yours today!
text.Response B: This set of glasses is a fun way to enjoy your two favorite drinks: beer and coffee!  The “Periodic Beer Glass” has the chemical elements that make up beer printed on it, while the “Caffeine Molecule Mug” has the caffeine molecule printed on it.  You can use them to nerd out while you drink your favorite beverages!

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

715.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle

Product features:
Made in the United States
100% recycled materials
1000 piece puzzle
Artist Lee Stoncek
Jigsaw puzzle

Response A

White Mountain Puzzles is proud to bring you the Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle. This Made in USA puzzle is made with 100% recycled materials and features 1000 pieces. The artistic rendering of the nesting loons is the work of renowned artist Lee Stoncek. White Mountain Puzzles is the oldest puzzle manufacturer in America and has been making puzzles for over 30 years. They are a family owned business and take great pride in the quality of their products. This puzzle would make a great gift for any puzzle lover, wildlife enthusiast, or someone who just wants to relax with a fun activity. Order yours today!

Response B

This set of glasses is a fun way to enjoy your two favorite drinks: beer and coffee! The “Periodic Beer Glass” has the chemical elements that make up beer printed on it, while the “Caffeine Molecule Mug” has the caffeine molecule printed on it. You can use them to nerd out while you drink your favorite beverages!
